english.segment1: Hallelujah! Salvation and glory, glory and power belong to our God. Hallelujah! Salvation and glory, glory and power belong to our God. Our Lord God Almighty reigns, our Lord God almighty reigns. Hallelujah! Salvation and glory, glory and power belong to our God. Hallelujah! Salvation and glory, glory and power belong to our God. Hallelujah! Salvation and glory, glory and power belong to our God. Lord God almighty reigns, our Lord God almighty reigns. Hallelujah! Salvation and glory, glory and power belong to our God. (repeat)
